infoDialog.title: NBA Player Similarity Tool
infoDialog.description: Learn how to use this tool and understand the data
infoDialog.introduction: This tool helps you find NBA players with similar playing styles and statistical profiles. Follow these simple steps:

steps.selectSeason: Select a season from the first dropdown menu. The tool uses data from the last 30 years to ensure comprehensive analysis.
steps.selectPlayer: Select a player from the second dropdown menu. You can search by typing a player's name.
steps.similarPlayers: The system will automatically display the most similar players based on a similarity algorithm. To do this, it uses player stats from the last 30 years, and employs the K-nearest neighbors algorithm to identify similar players.
steps.toggleViews: Toggle between Radar and Stats views to see different visualizations of player comparisons.
steps.radarChart: The radar chart shows how players compare across five key attributes.
steps.backToSelection: Click "Back to Player Selection" to choose a different player.

infoDialog.tip: Tip: The similarity percentage indicates how closely a player's style and statistics match your selected player.
infoDialog.modelExplanation: Our player similarity model analyzes multiple dimensions of player performance and style:

radarCategories.title: Radar Chart Categories
radarCategories.scoring: Scoring: Ability to score points through various methods
radarCategories.playmaking: Playmaking: Passing, court vision, and assist generation
radarCategories.defense: Defense: Defensive impact, steals, blocks, and positioning
radarCategories.athleticism: Athleticism: Speed, vertical leap, and physical attributes
radarCategories.basketballIQ: Basketball IQ: Game awareness and decision-making

infoDialog.algorithmExplanation: Our similarity algorithm combines these metrics with advanced statistics like usage rate, true shooting percentage, and defensive metrics to create a comprehensive player profile.
infoDialog.historicalContext: Historical Context: All calculations are based on player stats from the last 30 years, providing a rich historical perspective.
infoDialog.dataSource: Data Source: The data is sourced from Basketball Reference, ensuring accuracy and depth.
infoDialog.similiarityNote: Note: Similarity scores are relative and based on the selected season's statistics.
